subject: refactor: refine tone system from 29 to 25 tones, add interpersonal category
body:
Remove 8 redundant tones (grateful, loving, proud, casual, playful, firm,
calm, excited) and add 4 new ones: sarcastic (restored as own tone),
not-a-fight, boundary, no-reply. New "Between Us" category for conflict
management and relationship navigation. Fix duplicate colors for Supportive
and No Reply. Update migration map, theme category colors, tutorial, and docs.
